controllers

Class CreditController

  • java.lang.Object
    • play.mvc.Results
      • play.mvc.Controller
        • controllers.CreditController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    play.mvc.Http.HeaderNames, play.mvc.Http.Status

    public class CreditController
extends play.mvc.Controller
    This controller is User to control the Users Credit their amount, to get certain amount that User has, to Use them when a User wants to use them on a a certain product to get their product to be special(listed among the first ones) in search queries, to subtract them when used on certain products; Basically everything and every actions one with the Credits (which are simple integers), is done with this class CreditControllers;

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static play.mvc.Result addCredits()
      This method shows the User the page, where he should enter in the form the amount of Credits that he wants to buy;
      static play.mvc.Result addCreditsProcess()
      Method should take the amount entered in the form as the amount of Credit that the User wants to buy'
      static play.mvc.Result buyCreditSuccess(java.lang.String priceInUSD)
      After the paypal process of buying the bitpik credits; We set the value of the bitpik credits to the user adding them to the bitpik credits he has already had;
      static java.lang.String converterToStringUSD(double costKM)
      Transfers the double amount from KM to USD first then puts them in a String format;
      static double creditToCost(int credit)
      Transfers from the Credits to the amount in KM
      static java.lang.String getPriceString(double creditD)
      Method transfers to Costs in String format for printing;
      static play.mvc.Result makeProductNotSpecial(int id)
      Method that the admin can only use to delete the speciality of a product; Sets the attribute isSpecial of a product clicked on, to false;
      static play.mvc.Result purchaseCredit(java.lang.String priceKMString)
      Starting of the paypal process for the purchase of the bitpik credits; In case that the User presses Cancel he is redirected to the page addcredits.html and in the case that the User goes through, he is redirected to the next page "/purchaseSuccessCredits/"html page with the cost of the credits in USD;
      static play.mvc.Result purchaseSuccessCredits(java.lang.String priceInUSD)
      Successfull paypal process for the purchase of the bitpik credits;
      static play.mvc.Result showCredits()
      Main page for the BitPikCredits of the User; On which we give the amount of the BitPikcredits the User has; and give him the option to either use the Credits he has on certain products or an option to buy more Credits;
      static play.mvc.Result updateCredits(int id)
      Redirecting to the page where the user enters the amount of Credits he wants to update to the artical that is already made special (izdvojen);
      static play.mvc.Result updateCreditsProcess(int id)
      Updating the amount of the credits that we add to the product; As the method of using the credits on a product for the first time this method as well sets the users bpcredits to the new amount subtracting the used amount from the old amount; And now we set the products credit to the new amount which is the previous amount of credits that the product had plus the new amount we had just updated for;
      static play.mvc.Result useCredits(int id)
      The GET redirection for the page where the user enters the amount of bitpik credits he wants to use;
      static play.mvc.Result useCreditsProcess(int id)
      After entering the amount of credits to be used by the user we take the amounts entered here with the POST method; And add them to the product the User has choosen, And as well make the product special ("izdvojen oglas");

        Returns:

      • updateCreditsProcess

        public static play.mvc.Result updateCreditsProcess(int id)
        Updating the amount of the credits that we add to the product; As the method of using the credits on a product for the first time this method as well sets the users bpcredits to the new amount subtracting the used amount from the old amount; And now we set the products credit to the new amount which is the previous amount of credits that the product had plus the new amount we had just updated for;
        Parameters:
        id -
        Returns:
        Rendering the profile page;
